dt-api.name: row().child.isShown()
dt-api.summary: Check if the child rows of a parent row are visible

type.description: Check if the child rows of a parent row are visible
type.returns: `true` if child rows are visible, `false` otherwise.

dt-api.description: When working which child rows in DataTables, you may wish to know if a parent row's child rows are visible or not. This method provides exactly that ability, returning a boolean value indicating if the child rows are visible or not.

example.title: Show / hide a row based on its current state, adding the row content as needed.
